name: Escape Pod (V)
Lore: 'Capital starships have emergency escape pods. Equipped with food, water, flares, medpacs, hunting blaster and tracking beacon (R2-D2 deactivated this one''s beacon).',
Text: 'Take a dejarik, hologram, or holosite into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel a Force drain at a holosite. OR If opponent is about to place your character out of play, place that character in your Lost Pile instead.',
